and clever. This is all that his foreign education has done for him! I hope that here in Moscow no one will receive him, in spite of his money. They wanted to introduce him to me, but I quite declined: I have my daughters to consider." 
2O 
"Why do you say this young man is so rich?" asked die countess, turning away from the girls, who at once assumed an air of inatten- tion. "His children are all illegitimate. I drink Pierre also is illegitimate." 
The visitor made a gesture with her hand.
